about_the_game:
Help the little frog to safely reach the other side avoiding the hazards and dangers within the forest. Move the tiles around you to find one of the hidden paths that will lead you to your goal.

Hoping forest is a low poly tile-based puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere where your goal is to find a safe hidden path for the frog. Enjoy the different levels divided into 4 different map sizes, each one more difficult than the last one, while listening to some relaxing lofi music.



Move and rotate the different tiles to create the perfect path for each map. Avoid the hazards while you manage the fixed tiles that will force you to take a specific path. Try to catch files in your way to increase your score, but be aware, there's a limited amount of steps that the frog can do. Or search for the more straight and quick path to the other side.



Dive into this relaxing world with some lofi beats and take all the time you need to find that perfect solution you are looking for.
